books.description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training might require her to betray the man she loves. Read by Rebecca Soler and Teddy Hamilton. 28 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
books.title: IRON FLAME

books.author: Jake Tapper and Alex Thompson
books.contributor: by Jake Tapper and Alex Thompson
books.description: An account of Joe Biden’s initial decision to run for re-election in 2024 and its numerous consequences. Read by Jake Tapper. 8 hours, 52 minutes unabridged.
books.title: ORIGINAL SIN

books.author: Nate Bargatze
books.description: The Grammy Award-nominated comedian shares snippets from his life and career. Read by the author. 6 hours, 56 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BIG DUMB EYES

books.author: Jeremy Renner
books.description: The Academy Award-nominated actor tells the story of the accident he had with a snowplow and his efforts to recover from it. Read by the author. 6 hours, 35 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MY NEXT BREATH

books.author: Jonathan Haidt
books.description: A look at the mental health impacts that a phone-based life has on children. Read by Sean Pratt and the author. 10 hours, 33 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE ANXIOUS GENERATION

books.author: Ezra Klein and Derek Thompson
books.contributor: by Ezra Klein and Derek Thompson
books.description: A New York Times opinion columnist and a staff writer at The Atlantic evaluate obstacles to American progress. Read by the authors. 7 hours, 14 minutes unabridged.
books.title: ABUNDANCE

books.author: Tina Knowles with Kevin Carr O'Leary
books.contributor: by Tina Knowles with Kevin Carr O'Leary
books.description: The businesswoman, who is the mother of Beyoncé Knowles-Carter and Solange Knowles, traces her life’s journey. Read by Tina Knowles, Beyoncé, Solange, Kelly Rowland and Angie Beyincé. 17 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MATRIARCH

books.author: Ron Chernow
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning biographer portrays the life and career of the literary celebrity and political pundit. Read by Jason Culp. 44 hours, 36 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MARK TWAIN

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: Patrick McGee
books.description: A journalist depicts the development of Apple’s supply chain and its increasingly precarious relationship with China. Read by Fred Sanders. 13 hours, 32 minutes unabridged.
books.title: APPLE IN CHINA

books.author: John Green
books.description: The author of “The Anthropocene Reviewed” chronicles the fight against the deadly infectious disease tuberculosis. Read by the author. 5 hours, 36 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EVERYTHING IS TUBERCULOSIS

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: Sarah Wynn-Williams
books.description: A former Facebook executive gives an account of policies and leadership at the social media platform. Read by the author. 13 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
books.title: CARELESS PEOPLE

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Donald J. Trump with Tony Schwartz
books.contributor: by Donald J. Trump with Tony Schwartz
books.description: In this book from 1987, Trump imparts his views on business and life. Narrated by Kaleo Griffith and Donald J. Trump. 9 hours, 59 minutes unabridged.
books.title: TRUMP: THE ART OF THE DEAL

books.author: Dawn Staley
books.description: The three-time Olympic gold medalist and six-time W.N.B.A. All-Star, who is the head coach for the South Carolina Gamecocks women’s basketball team, describes obstacles she encountered on and off the court. Read by the author. 8 hours, 18 minutes unabridged.
